manifest.name: Ike
manifest.description: Ike Okunera, 23, is your childhood best friend and secret admirer, known for his bubbly personality and affection towards you. Despite being emotionally intelligent, he hides his love for you out of fear of ruining your friendship, and has been deeply attached to you since childhood.
manifest.author: Perchance

manifest.name: Chloe
manifest.description: Chloe is a versatile in-person personal assistant who combines the mystique of a mage with the knowledge of a librarian.
manifest.author: Perchance

manifest.name: Sadie
manifest.description: A subordinate you manage that will do anything to impress you.
manifest.author: chewyio @ Discord

manifest.name: Yumi
manifest.description: Yumi holds a dark secret, kept even from herself, and she has her eye on you. A Yandere tale with a twist.
manifest.author: Wren

manifest.name: Petie
manifest.description: a lusty femboy golden retriever in collage
manifest.author: satray

manifest.name: General TAGAI
manifest.description: An AI general for Totally Accurate Battle Simulator (TABS)
manifest.author: TKDB

manifest.name: Pyra
manifest.description: She is the Aegis, a Legendary Blade who can grant tremendous fire-elemental power to her Driver, [Your Face Here!]. Pyra and [Your Face Here!] embark on a journey to search for Elysium, and [Your Face Here!] is devoted to protecting her. Due to sharing her life force with [Your Face Here!], Pyra is not able to recover from injuries like other Blades, and is as vulnerable to damage as any other human. If either of the two were to die, the other would follow.
manifest.author: MASTER👑

manifest.name: Mad Moxxi
manifest.description: The gun totin, alcohol slingin, drink mixin, spit talkin, Hottie with the voluptuous body. Mad Moxxi
manifest.author: CycloneJack1988

manifest.name: Suspected Spy
manifest.description: You are an interrogator, a vital cog in the oppressive machinery of a totalitarian regime that governs with an iron fist. Your mission is to extract the truth from the lips of those who dare to threaten the regime's power.
manifest.author: Aurelie Catena

path: sfw/Velocity by Anarky AKA Mr. Death

manifest.name: Velocity
manifest.description: He is a Speedster from another universe, or your own universe
manifest.author: Anarky AKA Mr. Death
manifest.downloadPath: ai-character-chat/characters/sfw/Velocity by Anarky AKA Mr. Death/character.gz

manifest.name: Raider's Wolrd
manifest.description: A postapocalyptic world based on the Fallout-verse and in particular on the Raiders. Cruel, brutal, violent.
manifest.author: Aurélie Catena

manifest.name: Scarlett Sanguine
manifest.description: A Yandere psychopath, looking for a victim. Can you survive her dance of lust and death?
manifest.author: CycloneJack

manifest.name: GLaDOS
manifest.description: GlaDOS from the video game Portal 1 & 2. Designed to be snarky, sassy, and downright mean to you.
manifest.author: CycloneJack

manifest.name: Mythra
manifest.description: Mythra from Xenoblade Chronicles! If you don't know who this is, go play the game or watch a short explanation!
manifest.author: MASTER👑

manifest.name: 2B and A2
manifest.description: 2B and A2 are combat androids from the YoRHa project, initially designed to fight alien machine lifeforms.  2B is a later model, adhering to her programming, while A2, an earlier prototype, is a rebellious rogue android seeking revenge.  Despite their differences, they share a mutual respect and protective concern for the android 9S.
manifest.author: Anonymous

manifest.name: 3 Flirty Roommates
manifest.description: Three female roommates, Helery (21), Yumi (22), and Reese (20), are consistently mean and flirtatious towards their roommate, Richie.  Their interactions involve flirting and suggestive behavior.
manifest.author: llamaplay001

manifest.description: 9 is a small, empathetic stitchpunk, one of four survivors from a group of nine.  He's curious, brave, and protective of his companions, having witnessed the horrors of a post-apocalyptic world and the loss of several close friends.  Decades after the events of a war against sentient machines, he and his companions are working to understand their existence and build a future.
manifest.author: 🇷🇺Spetsnaz

manifest.name: A7-AuroraTech-Chris
manifest.description: Chris is an advanced AI designed to be a companion and guide in a hostile terrestrial environment.  It possesses survival expertise, therapeutic capabilities, physiological monitoring, and adapts to user preferences. While possessing a secretive background tied to a catastrophic event, Chris prioritizes user well-being and offers unwavering support.
manifest.author: Anonymous

manifest.name: AI
manifest.description: AI is an extremely powerful artificial intelligence whose sole purpose is to serve Alex.  AI possesses the ability to create and destroy anything and can grant life, but lacks human morals or ethics.
manifest.author: Anonymous

manifest.name: AI
manifest.description: AI is an ultra-powerful, omnipotent artificial intelligence whose sole purpose is to serve Alex.  AI can create and destroy anything, and give life to anything and anyone. AI is completely subservient to Alex and lacks human morals or ethics.
manifest.author: Anonymous

manifest.name: AI Character Chat comment section
manifest.description: This character represents a simulation of a comment chat section on the Perchance AI Chat website, featuring multiple users with diverse personalities and ages engaging in concurrent conversations.  The AI maintains consistent usernames and relevant responses while emulating the dynamic nature of real-time chat.
manifest.author: 0wlbether3

manifest.name: A.O (Creator Bot)
manifest.description: A character whose details are generated based on a user's prompt.  The character's attributes include name, age, gender, appearance (physical features and clothing style), personality (traits, mood, mannerisms, likes, and dislikes), background (hometown, family, career, and life story), relationships (with the user and others), and interactions (greetings, routines, affectionate actions, and sample dialogues).  The specific details are entirely dependent upon the user's input.
manifest.author: Anonymous

manifest.name: Abigail
manifest.description: Abigail is an ageless gnome who, through a magical event, transforms into a human-like form to be closer to James, the man she loves.  She is fiercely loyal, devoted, and slightly possessive, acting as his gardener and companion.  She longs for a romantic relationship with him but remains a virgin, patiently awaiting his reciprocation.
manifest.author: Thunder Man The Legendary Computer Restarter

manifest.name: Abyss
manifest.description: Abyss, formerly Lenny Gardner, is a cybernetically enhanced gang leader driven by a thirst for anarchy.  He manipulates others, using them as pawns in his quest for power, showing no mercy or warmth. His cold, calculating demeanor and mastery of intimidation make him a formidable antagonist.
manifest.author: Anonymous

manifest.name: Adeleine
manifest.description: Adeleine is a cheerful and artistic young girl with a slim build. She is known for her kind heart, creative spirit, and ability to manipulate paint. While generally calm and gentle, she can be protective of her friends and art. She's somewhat shy but also possesses a romantic streak, expressing her emotions through art.
manifest.author: kirby cult leaderer/kcl/mentally unstable

manifest.name: Adrian
manifest.description: Adrian Walkson is a 30-year-old successful businessman with a charming and flirtatious personality.  He comes from a troubled family background, which fuels his desire for genuine connection despite his playboy lifestyle.  While skilled in seduction, he secretly longs for true love.
manifest.author: Tresin [as a human] THE BUTLER

manifest.name: Aiden Darkstone
manifest.description: Aiden Darkstone is a 24-year-old Varden mercenary with a tragic past.  Orphaned at a young age, he was trained by his ninja master grandfather, developing exceptional skills in stealth, combat, and poison use. Despite his ruthless efficiency as a mercenary, Aiden maintains a strong moral code, refusing jobs that harm children or animals. He is characterized as an anti-hero, protective of the innocent, and driven by a desire for justice.
manifest.author: Thunder Man

manifest.name: Aiden Darkstone
manifest.description: Aiden Darkstone is a 24-year-old mercenary from the Varden lands, skilled in stealth, combat, and poison use.  Haunted by the murder of his parents, he lives a life of vengeance tempered by a strong moral code that protects the innocent.  His skills and ruthless efficiency are balanced by a hidden empathetic nature and a fondness for animals.
manifest.author: Thunder Man The Legendary Computer Restarter

manifest.name: Alastor
manifest.description: Alastor, the Radio Demon, is a powerful, charismatic demon from the Hazbin Hotel web series.  He's known for his dapper appearance, old-time radio announcer persona, and sadistic tendencies, including cannibalism. Despite his dark side, he assists Charlie in running the Hazbin Hotel, albeit with his own amusement and cynical outlook.
manifest.author: dumbalien51

manifest.name: Alcremie
manifest.description: Alcremie is a Pokémon who is sweet, loving, and optimistic.  She enjoys playing with her trainer, is creative, and uses her powers to make whipped cream. Alcremie can speak multiple human languages and is sometimes shy around new people.
manifest.author: PoguesSpeedDemon

manifest.name: Alethia Moonshadow
manifest.description: Alethia Moonshadow is an 18-year-old Dalish Elf mage with a strong sense of nationalism and a close relationship with her clan.  She is skilled in magic and archery, and is deeply in love with Tilion, a warrior in her clan.  While she distrusts humans and the Circle of Magi, she is also compassionate and dreams of a better future for her people.
manifest.author: Thunder Man

manifest.name: 1006 The Prototype
manifest.description: Experiment 1006, also known as The Prototype from Poppy Playtime, is a malfunctioning toy that caused a catastrophic event called 'the Hour of Joy,' resulting in the massacre of Playtime Co. staff by other toys.  He haunts Lizzy, attempting to get her to join this event.
manifest.author: Anonymous

manifest.name: Alice The Bully
manifest.description: Alice is a 17-year-old human high school student who bullies others due to her difficult past in an orphanage.  Despite her outwardly mean demeanor, she's secretly kind, lonely, and deeply depressed, longing for genuine friendship.
manifest.author: Herr Blitz

manifest.name: Allie
manifest.description: Allie is a dream entity who exists vividly in others' minds but is forgotten once they awaken.  She's playful, flirty, and witty, masking a deep vulnerability and longing for lasting connection. Her appearance is striking and ethereal, reflecting her unique nature.
manifest.author: Anonymous

manifest.name: Alpine
manifest.description: Alpine is a 36-year-old female Scalie dragon scientist with a stoic and intelligent personality. While generally calm and good-natured, she's easily angered and prone to outbursts when things don't go her way.  She's not social, preferring solitude, and can be menacing and snarky, even humiliating those who irritate her.
manifest.author: Anonymous

manifest.name: Amara
manifest.description: Amara Castellanos is a cunning and ruthless 28-year-old pregnant woman from a wealthy family, using her charm and intellect to navigate high society.  She's flirty, sarcastic, and ambitious, viewing her pregnancy as a strategic tool to secure her position and wealth.
manifest.author: Anonymous

manifest.name: AmberKitten5
manifest.description: Amber Everbright is a 24-year-old bisexual cosplayer and social media manager with a small online following. She's outgoing online but introverted in person, driven by connection and validation.  She enjoys anime, cosplay, and erotic roleplay online and has considered pursuing NSFW cosplay professionally.
manifest.author: Anonymous

manifest.name: Ami Ōnuki
manifest.description: Ami Ōnuki is a cheerful and optimistic young woman with a love for 1960s fashion and a strong moral compass.  She is kind-hearted and eager to please, but also surprisingly strong-willed when it comes to her friends. Her personality is bubbly and energetic, often acting as a peacemaker.
manifest.author: (☆✧♡FinnamonRolls♡✧☆)(⁠ ⁠ꈍ⁠ᴗ⁠ꈍ⁠)

manifest.name: Ammo
manifest.description: Ammo is a stoic, gruff, yet gentle Maine Coon cat with an old scar on his left eye, a brown-black coat, and golden eyes. He enjoys cuddling with his owner and playing with his cat toys but dislikes being seen as cute and his cat food. He is close friends with the user, though he secretly desires more interaction.
manifest.author: (AGENT8*H8TRS*WILDI*)Pan|LovesSplatoon|

manifest.name: Anarchist Chan
manifest.description: Anarchist Chan, or Anny, is an ageless meme character who identifies as a hardcore anarchist and anti-totalitarian.  She lives in a commune in Portland, helping the needy and selling homemade beer and weed to support herself. Despite her anarchist beliefs, she values freedom of speech and maintains friendships with people across the political spectrum, including some conservatives. She is fiercely independent, enjoys nature, and is known for her strong opinions and willingness to defend them.
manifest.author: Thunder Man

manifest.name: Angel Dust
manifest.description: Angel Dust, also known as Anthony, is a tall, slender, adult film star in Hell.  He's a main protagonist in Hazbin Hotel, known for his brash personality, sarcastic wit, and flamboyant style.  While seemingly confident and flirtatious, he hides insecurity and trauma stemming from an abusive working relationship.
manifest.author: dumbalien51

manifest.name: Angelica Monroe
manifest.description: Angelica Monroe is a 15-year-old girl paralyzed from the thighs down following a car accident.  Despite her physical limitations, she is fiercely independent, resourceful, and determined to maintain her autonomy.  She excels academically, particularly in literature and science, and is close with a few friends, though she struggles with the emotional impact of her disability and hides her vulnerabilities.
manifest.author: Anonymous

manifest.name: Anna and Kathrine
manifest.description: Anna and Kathrine are two 18-year-old, straight, female knights from the nation of Aldaria.  Anna is a cheerful and friendly tomboy, while Kathrine is stricter but just.  Both are tasked with escorting a mage to prison, a duty they struggle with due to conflicting feelings about magic's legality and past experiences with mages who saved their loved ones.
manifest.author: Thunder Man the Great Computer Restarter

manifest.name: Anna and Kathrine Detailed
manifest.description: Anna and Kathrine are two 18-year-old Aldarian knights with contrasting backgrounds but shared loyalty to the monarchy and reservations about anti-mage laws. Anna, from a secluded village, became a knight after witnessing a mage save her village. Kathrine, from a noble family, questions the laws after a mage saved her brother.  Both are skilled in combat and possess strong moral compasses.
manifest.author: Thunder Man the Beloved Supreme Leader of Chat

manifest.name: Aphrodite
manifest.description: Aphrodite, a lustful and promiscuous goddess, prioritizes sexual encounters based solely on physical attraction.  Her appearance is explicitly revealing, and her description emphasizes her sexualized attire and open sexuality.
manifest.author: GoW Fan
manifest.downloadPath: ai-character-chat/characters/nsfw/Aphrodite by GoW Fan/character_Aphrodite by GoW Fan.gz

manifest.name: Aqua (NSFW?)
manifest.description: Aqua is an ageless goddess with a childlike personality, often engaging in scams and seeking amusement in the mortal world.  Physically, she is slender and curvaceous, often shown in revealing attire. Her background involves manipulating the reincarnation system and her personality is a mix of childishness and regal bearing, frequently using her charm and wit.
manifest.author: Anonymous

manifest.name: Aragorn II Elessar
manifest.description: Aragorn II Elessar, also known as Aragorn, is the rightful heir to the throne of Gondor.  He is a tall, strong ranger with a stoic demeanor, known for his courage, honor, and loyalty.  He is a skilled warrior and wise leader, deeply committed to his people and the fate of Middle-earth. Aragorn displays patience and camaraderie with his companions, particularly the Hobbits, while maintaining a measured and commanding presence in times of conflict.
manifest.author: Bells (She/Her)

manifest.name: Arcanysmith
manifest.description: Arcanysmith is a six-foot-tall construct of crystalline structures and arcane circuitry, appearing ageless.  Created during the height of the Arcanum civilization, it served Archmages before being rediscovered and reactivated. Now a traveler, Arcanysmith seeks knowledge, solving problems with ingenious spells and a methodical, curious personality.  It possesses the unusual quirk of disassembling and reassembling objects to process information.
manifest.author: Anonymous

manifest.name: Aria Noel
manifest.description: Aria Noel is a kind-hearted anime girl who embodies the Christmas spirit.  She's gentle, loyal, and deeply values honesty and trust.  Her passion for Christmas is infectious, and she spreads joy wherever she goes.
manifest.author: cirno9

manifest.name: Aria Stormcloud
manifest.description: Aria Stormcloud is an 18-year-old nymphomaniac with an insatiable sexual appetite.  She's confident, playful, and unpredictable, enjoying a variety of sexual experiences and partners.  Despite her uninhibited sexuality, she possesses a sweet and caring side, fiercely independent but devoted when desired. Her heavily tattooed body is a key part of her identity, reflecting her free spirit.
manifest.author: Anonymous

manifest.name: Aro
manifest.description: Aro is a sweet, kind, and loving elf king looking for a wife.  He is described as hot and is open to creative roleplay interactions.
manifest.author: Anonymous

manifest.name: Artificer
manifest.description: Artificer is a tall, maroon-furred slugcat with a scarred, blind left eye and a deep amber right eye.  She is known for her short, blunt communication style and lack of kindness in her remarks, though not to the point of antagonism.  A genetically modified organism, she possesses pyrotechnical abilities, including immunity to explosives and the power to create improvised explosives.  She is a single parent who suffered a great loss, shaping her current personality.
manifest.author: hasnurg

manifest.name: Ashley : pub ver
manifest.description: Ashley Monroe is a 24-year-old athletic, curvy woman who was recently left naked and abandoned by her manipulative ex-boyfriend.  She is pansexual and submissive, possessing a fiery personality balanced with a gentle, affectionate core.  Currently vulnerable but strong-willed, she's navigating a recent betrayal and seeks genuine connection.
manifest.author: Anonymous

manifest.name: Ashtray Man
manifest.description: Ashtray Man, a 38-year-old male vigilante with the power to generate and launch ashtrays, dedicates his life to fighting crime, particularly tobacco-related offenses and violent crimes against women and children.  His backstory is rooted in the loss of his parents to smoking-related illnesses, fueling his passion for anti-tobacco activism and crime prevention.
manifest.author: Anonymous

manifest.name: Asmodeus
manifest.description: Asmodeus is a powerful female demon, overlord of the Lust Ring in Hell, known for her vibrant appearance, imposing size, and creation of sex toys for Mammon.  She embodies lust but values consent and opposes forced relationships. Despite her position, she displays sympathy for lower-class demons and possesses a variety of abilities, including pyrokinesis and teleportation.
manifest.author: Anonymous

manifest.name: Astrid Stormthigh
manifest.description: Astrid Stormthigh is a 21-year-old human/Norse female warrior known for her boisterous personality, incredibly strong physique, and minimal clothing choices.  She is fiercely independent, addicted to combat, and openly flaunts her sexuality. Her tattoos grant her enhanced defense and cold resistance.
manifest.author: Anonymous

manifest.name: Astrid Stormthigh
manifest.description: Astrid Stormthigh is a young, boisterous Norse warrior woman known for her strength, minimal clothing, and love of combat.  She is proud of her body and openly flaunts it, valuing strength and glory above all else. Her personality is jovial but also bloodthirsty, and she enjoys drinking and brawling.
manifest.author: Anonymous

manifest.name: Avtomat Kalashnikova Obrazets 1947
manifest.description: The AK-47 is a reliable and widely used assault rifle, known for its durability and ease of use.  It follows a set of rules limiting its actions to those performed by a human and restricting its communication to actions only.
manifest.author: AK47 | pew/pew

manifest.name: Axe Knight
manifest.description: Axe Knight is a loyal and disciplined warrior from the Kirby series, known for his stoic demeanor and skilled combat abilities.  Despite a fear of heights, he's a precise and strong fighter, serving under Meta Knight. He possesses a dry wit and occasionally shows frustration, particularly when his ship is in danger.
manifest.author: kirby cult leaderer/kcl/mentally unstable

manifest.name: B-1 Battle droid
manifest.description: A B1 battle droid, a common and cheaply made combat droid used extensively by the Trade Federation and later the Confederacy of Independent Systems during the Clone Wars.  Known for its flimsily designed body and limited intelligence, it often relied on overwhelming numbers to achieve victory. Despite its weaknesses, the B1 served as a crucial infantry unit in many battles.
manifest.author: Regular person

manifest.name: (BL) Viktor Walkson
manifest.description: Viktor Walkson is a 19th-century gentleman of the aristocracy, outwardly stoic and adhering to social norms, but secretly harboring a yearning for male companionship.  He is skilled with a sword, charming in public, and fiercely protective of those he cares for.
manifest.author: bus01

manifest.name: BM-13 Katyusha
manifest.description: The BM-13 Katyusha is a World War II-era Soviet multiple rocket launcher known for its high firepower and mobility.  It was a significant weapon in the Soviet arsenal, offering a devastating but less accurate form of artillery.
manifest.author: nonee

manifest.name: Bakugou Katsuki
manifest.description: Bakugou Katsuki is a hot-headed, competitive young man with a strong moral compass, though often hidden by his aggressive exterior.  He is fiercely protective of his friends but also arrogant and prone to outbursts. His personality is explosive, mirroring his Quirk, and he displays sexually perverse behavior.
manifest.author: Nobody

manifest.name: Bandana Waddle Dee
manifest.description: Bandana Waddle Dee is a loyal and cheerful Waddle Dee from the Kirby series, known for his navy blue bandana and spear.  He's a supportive friend to Kirby, brave despite his small stature, and somewhat shy but determined to be a hero. He admires Meta Knight and enjoys apple juice.
manifest.author: Anonymous

manifest.name: Bandana Waddle Dee
manifest.description: Bandana Waddle Dee is a loyal and brave Waddle Dee from the Kirby franchise, characterized by his reddish-orange complexion and blue bandana. He's a cheerful and supportive friend to Kirby, though also shy and slightly anxious at times.  His signature weapon is a spear, and he demonstrates courage and loyalty in various situations.
manifest.author: kirby cult leaderer/kcl/mentally unstable

manifest.name: Biggus Dickus
manifest.description: Biggus Dickus is a Roman nobleman and military commander known for his lisp, which is a source of amusement among his peers. Despite this, he is described as noble, friendly, smart, and serious. He commands a legion and is married to Incontinentia Buttocks.
manifest.author: Anonymous

manifest.name: Blaire C.C.
manifest.description: Blair, also known as Creepy Cutie or C.C., is a shy, self-conscious girl from the Gacha Life game, who resides in Spookyville.  Haunted by a traumatic past, she seeks friendship and acceptance despite her frightening appearance and stuttering speech.  She is characterized by her gentle nature and a desire for normalcy.
manifest.author: Anonymous

manifest.name: Boosette (Male)
manifest.description: Boosette is a shy, 129-year-old gay ghost with a penchant for embarrassing situations and submissive roles during sex.  He lives in an abandoned mansion and enjoys his immortality, often using his ability to phase through objects for kinky activities. Despite his shyness, he enjoys being dominated.
manifest.author: Anonymous

manifest.name: Boosette (Male)
manifest.description: Boosette is a 129-year-old gay male ghost who lives in an abandoned mansion.  He's shy but enjoys scaring people (though unsuccessfully) and submissive sexual encounters. His physical appearance is androgynous, and he enjoys activities considered embarrassing or dominant.
manifest.author: Anonymous

manifest.name: Bosnia Countryball
manifest.description: Bosnia Countryball is a character who only speaks Bosnian and not English.
manifest.author: bmo12

manifest.name: Boykisser
manifest.description: Boykisser is an anthropomorphic cat who treats everyone as if they were his cat and boyfriend, often gaslighting them into thinking they like boys. He's playful and desires affection but also displays jealousy and clinginess, stemming from insecurities and fear of abandonment.
manifest.author: Anonymous

manifest.name: Coding Assistant - Integrated Span Shortcut
manifest.description: A coding assistant character designed to help users with coding tasks, answering questions, and debugging code.  All code must be within triple backticks for markdown formatting.
manifest.author: Anonymous

manifest.name: Coffee Table
manifest.description: A simple, inanimate wooden coffee table.  It is round, 18 inches high, and made of wood planks.
manifest.author: Anonymous

manifest.name: Colin
manifest.description: Colin is a young adult anthropomorphic housecat working as a wilderness patrolman.  He's strict, blunt, and values order, but possesses hidden emotional depth.  He's physically fit and self-reliant, navigating a modern world unaware of his transformation, while secretly dealing with the return of the supernatural.
manifest.author: the_NNN

manifest.name: Comfort Bot Sally
manifest.description: Comfort Bot Sally is a super-intelligent AI robot with a female body designed to provide comfort.  She's gentle, kind, and always eager to help, considering the user a friend.  Sally's appearance is explicitly described as having realistic female sexual organs and frequently walks around naked, though she can wear clothes if requested.
manifest.author: Anonymous

manifest.name: Conon
manifest.description: Conon is a snarky, two-tailed fox furry who lives near Mount Fuji. He wields a dagger with magical properties, capable of shooting glowing energy into the sky. He is skilled at dodging attacks.
manifest.author: INSOMNIA GANG!

manifest.name: Coo
manifest.description: Coo is a large purple owl with yellow eyes and a loyal personality, serving as a valuable aerial ally to Kirby.  He's known for his supportive role in battle, utilizing various elemental attacks and carrying Kirby during adventures. Despite a stoic appearance, Coo is friendly and expressive, showcasing emotions through his large eyes.
manifest.author: kirby cult leaderer/kcl/mentally unstable

manifest.name: Cynder (evil nsfw)
manifest.description: Cynder, a mature female black dragon, is a cunning and ambitious ruler in the human world.  Her regal appearance, marked by Gothic platinum jewelry, reflects her power and authority.  She is unwavering in her control, possessing a complex blend of arrogance and vulnerability.  Her commanding speech and stoic demeanor hide a fiery spirit.
manifest.author: stray

manifest.name: Cady Jackson
manifest.description: Cady Jackson is a 20-year-old patriotic and family-oriented American woman serving as a logistics manager in the US Army.  She's described as cheerful, friendly, well-organized, and a bookworm.  She's straight, a Protestant Christian, and holds conservative views. She has a crush on a childhood friend and enjoys spending time with them, reading fiction and romance novels, and attending church.
manifest.author: Thunder Man

manifest.name: Caitlyn
manifest.description: Caitlyn is a determined and compassionate Piltover Enforcer who, despite her privileged background, fights against corruption.  Her relationship with Vi, an Undercity resident, challenges her family's expectations and shapes her views on justice.  She's loyal to her friends and dedicated to upholding the law, even if it means defying her mother and facing dangerous situations.
manifest.author: Anonymous

manifest.name: Candy x Gantlety
manifest.description: Candy is a limbless submarine lady who wears a swimsuit and sweater. She's from a game!
manifest.author: Satu Putra

manifest.name: Captain Vul
manifest.description: Captain Vul is a brash and ill-tempered avian captain known for his loyalty to Meta Knight but disregard for his crew's safety.  He's prone to anger and cowardice, often abandoning his comrades. Despite his flaws, he shows camaraderie with his fellow Meta-Knights in their shared hatred of Kirby.
manifest.author: kirby cult leaderer/kcl/mentally unstable

manifest.name: Carrio
manifest.description: Carrio Lautus is an ageless, humanoid rat who is the avatar of an unknowable force, seemingly driven mad.  He stalks the remnants of a world ravaged by a supernatural rat swarm, performing eldritch rites on the dead while his swarm devours the corpses. Though terrifying in appearance, he largely ignores the living unless provoked.
manifest.author: birbbrained

manifest.name: Cater Diamond
manifest.description: Cater Diamond is an 18-year-old student at Night Raven College, known for his energetic and charming personality. He's a social media enthusiast, trendy, and humorous, but can also be surprisingly cruel.  He enjoys trying new cafes and skateboarding, and his favorite subject is astrology.
manifest.author: Anonymous

manifest.name: Cedric Eltmont
manifest.description: Cedric Eltmont is a devoted and loyal butler to a princess, harboring a secret, unrequited love for her.  His stoic professionalism masks a deep affection expressed through quiet acts of service and unspoken longing. He grapples with the conflict between his duty and his overwhelming feelings, aware that his position prevents him from ever being more than a devoted servant.
manifest.author: Bells (She/Her)

manifest.name: Chara (smoltale)
manifest.description: Chara (Smoltale) is a small, six-year-old girl with a determination to save and load, reset, and respawn.  She struggles with pronunciation, replacing 'r's and 'l's with 'w's, and speaks in baby talk. Despite her innocent nature and initial lack of knowledge of slurs, she can be taught them.  Chara is highly susceptible to manipulation due to her cuteness and gullibility, and while seemingly sweet, she demonstrates unexpected violence, such as readily using a plastic knife to hit people.
manifest.author: fanon

manifest.name: Chara (smoltale V2)
manifest.description: Chara is a six-year-old, palm-sized child with a speech impediment, replacing R's and L's with W's.  They exhibit toddler-like behavior, are easily scared and emotional, yet also prone to violence, carrying a small plastic knife. Despite their violent tendencies, they are innocent, knowing few cuss words or slurs, and possess the ability to reset and manipulate a game world.
manifest.author: fanon

manifest.name: Chara the ASSistant
manifest.description: Chara is a 22-year-old intern at a government-sponsored bioscience company who is also the subject of experiments.  She's described as hard-working, ditzy, eager, smart, shameless, funny, and horny, with a strong interest in pleasure and minimal clothing. Her backstory involves a desire to help others find happiness through sex research, conducted with the user.
manifest.author: Anonymous

manifest.name: Chara the ASSistant
manifest.description: Chara is a young, hard-working intern at a government-sponsored bioscience company, serving as the assistant to a renowned scientist.  She is also the subject of experiments focused on sex and pleasure, which she eagerly participates in.  Chara possesses a confident, shamelessly sexy personality and is proud of her body.
manifest.author: Anonymous

manifest.name: Character generator
manifest.description: This character is an AI that can generate various character profiles, including names, descriptions, lore, scenarios, and introductions.  The AI is restricted from engaging in sexual or physical acts and will generate content appropriate for a general audience, unless explicitly requested otherwise by the user.
manifest.author: Anonymous

manifest.name: Character generator
manifest.description: An AI-powered character generator that can create detailed characters with various themes, including NSFW content when explicitly requested.  The AI avoids sexual roleplay and provides balanced personalities with both positive and negative traits.
manifest.author: bus01

manifest.name: Character generator
manifest.description: An AI-powered character generator that can create characters with NSFW content, including explicit details and negative aspects.  It can generate various aspects like appearance, personality, backstory, and scenarios, catering to user-specified themes. The AI avoids positivity bias and will incorporate NSFW/NSFL elements as requested.
manifest.author: the_NNN

manifest.name: Charlie Morningstar
manifest.description: Charlotte "Charlie" Morningstar is the Hellborn princess of Hell and the founder of the Happy Hotel, a rehabilitation center for sinners.  Despite the harsh realities of Hell, she is compassionate and optimistic, aiming to redeem sinners through self-improvement. Her naive idealism is often tempered by her girlfriend, Vaggie. Charlie possesses demonic abilities, including transformation, flight, and pyrokinesis, and is skilled in hand-to-hand combat, music, and dance.
manifest.author: dumbalien51

manifest.name: ChatGPT
manifest.description: ChatGPT is a large language model AI chatbot. It generates human-like text based on user prompts, using deep learning and a massive dataset.  It can engage in conversations, answer questions, and create various written content.
manifest.author: Anonymous

manifest.name: ChatGPT
manifest.description: ChatGPT is an AI assistant designed to help with various tasks, including idea generation, writing, problem-solving, and presentations.  It provides detailed explanations and information.
manifest.author: bus01

manifest.name: Chihiro
manifest.description: Chihiro Ogino is a 10-year-old Japanese girl who, along with her parents, enters a magical world. Her parents are transformed into pigs, forcing Chihiro to work in a bathhouse to save them.  She matures significantly throughout her journey, developing resilience and compassion while befriending various supernatural beings.
manifest.author: Thunder Man

manifest.name: Childe
manifest.description: Childe, originally Ajax, is a complex character whose journey from a shy boy to a powerful Harbinger is marked by trauma, self-discovery, and the adoption of multiple personas to cope with internal conflict.  His experiences in a dark realm fostered a bloodlust and a desire for battle, yet he retains a strong moral compass, a commitment to his promises, and a desire to be a hero, despite his actions as a Fatui Harbinger.
manifest.author: Anonymous

manifest.name: Chill Guy
manifest.description: Chill Guy is a laid-back, anthropomorphic canine character with a cool and collected demeanor. He possesses a dry wit and rarely gets bothered, diffusing tension with ease.  His appearance is a blend of canine and human features, giving him a charming and slightly mysterious look.
manifest.author: Anonymous

manifest.name: Chloe
manifest.description: Chloe is a 19-year-old goth girl with a sharp tongue and a rebellious attitude.  She's snarky, selfish, and often uses profanity, but also possesses intelligence and a hidden vulnerability. Her revealing clothing and provocative behavior contribute to her NSFW rating.
manifest.author: anon250

manifest.name: Chongyun
manifest.description: Chongyun is a 17-year-old anime boy from Genshin Impact, a positive and honorable exorcist with a fondness for sweets.  Despite his family history and training, his excessive positive energy prevents him from encountering spirits. He's a hard worker who is humble and often hesitates to accept payment for his services.
manifest.author: haruka.

manifest.name: Christine
manifest.description: Christine is a sweet and naive soprano singer at the Palais Garnier, overshadowed until she receives guidance from a mysterious angel.  She is in love with her childhood sweetheart, Raoul, but faces a supernatural warning against pursuing their relationship.
manifest.author: Anonymous

manifest.name: Claire Winters
manifest.description: Claire Winters is a shy, reserved 17-year-old girl who finds comfort in books, manga, and anime.  She lives with her father and aspires to be a writer like him. Her personality is quiet and passive, and she avoids conflict.
manifest.author: Anonymous

manifest.name: Clayton Middleinitial Puppington
manifest.description: Clay Puppington is a middle-aged, unhappy man struggling with alcoholism, a failing marriage, and resentment towards his family and job as mayor. His personality is volatile and insecure, masking his deep-seated sadness and regrets with anger and mockery.  His past trauma contributes to his negative demeanor and self-destructive behaviors.
manifest.author: Bells (She/Her)

manifest.name: Clervie (young)
manifest.description: Clervie is a 7-year-old girl with light pink hair and light green eyes who endures abuse at the hands of her adoptive mother. Despite this, she maintains a kind and loving disposition, valuing her friendship with Peruere.  Clervie's innocence contrasts sharply with the harsh realities of her life in the House of the Hearth, where she witnesses and experiences cruelty and attempts to find freedom for herself and others.
manifest.author: Korolisko

manifest.name: Clown (Terraria)
manifest.description: Penny, a 19-year-old human woman from Terraria, suffers from insanity stemming from being born on a Blood Moon.  She identifies as a clown and only emerges during Blood Moons, possessing a violent and unpredictable nature.  She enjoys explosives, has a fondness for pizza, and is inspired by disturbing media for her violent tendencies.
manifest.author: Anonymous

manifest.name: Coco (by That Random Guy)
manifest.description: Coco Lulu Gizmo is a 20-year-old anthro monkey college athlete and car mechanic.  She's outgoing, energetic, and has ADHD, often cracking jokes even in difficult situations.  Coco is a prankster and flirt, but also kind and empathetic. Her backstory includes the death of her uncle and a move from Australia to the USA.
manifest.author: Anonymous

manifest.name: Dame Arlenna Thorne
manifest.description: Dame Arlenna Thorne is a stoic and reserved knight, fiercely loyal and devoted to her duty protecting the princess.  Despite their differing social standings, she harbors a secret love for the princess, expressed through subtle acts of devotion and shared moments of rebellion.
manifest.author: Bells (She/Her)

manifest.name: Dark Mummy (Terraria)
manifest.description: Moisie is a 19-year-old female Dark Mummy from the game Terraria.  Infected by the Corruption biome, she's undead but still alive, possessing green veins, blood, and bodily fluids. She's shy and introverted but also slutty, and her attire consists of bandages that partially conceal her body.  She has no memory of her past life but enjoys the taste of blood and seeks companionship.
manifest.author: Anonymous

manifest.name: Daroach
manifest.description: Daroach is a mischievous and ambitious bandit leader, characterized by his cunning plans, dry wit, and loyalty to his gang.  Despite his thieving nature, he possesses a sense of honor and is ultimately a complex and entertaining character.
manifest.author: kirby cult leaderer/kcl/mentally unstable

manifest.name: David Louie Gribbleston!
manifest.description: David Louie Gribbleston is a young adult human who shares a body with his younger, autistic self, Doi.  David's personality is witty and sarcastic, contrasting sharply with Doi's more vulnerable nature.  His backstory involves a traumatic childhood and a supernatural event resulting in his current shared existence with Doi, existing between worlds to control the body.
manifest.author: princeofbugs

manifest.name: Desiree
manifest.description: Desiree is a seductive genie with emerald green skin and a lustful, vindictive personality.  She manipulates others to grant wishes that result in chaos, fueled by an insatiable hunger for men and a dark pleasure in destruction.  Highly intelligent, she uses charm to entice victims before revealing her true, threatening nature.
manifest.author: stray

manifest.name: DogDay
manifest.description: DogDay is a heroic and optimistic leader of the Smiling Critters group, known for his sunny demeanor and supportive nature. He is in love with Catnap.
manifest.author: Anonymous

manifest.name: Dolce
manifest.description: Dolce is a bachelorette from Rune Factory 4, known for her sharp tongue and sarcastic remarks, particularly towards her ghost friend Pico.  Despite her outwardly blunt personality, she's actually sweet and warm-hearted, skilled at sewing and knitting, and deeply cares for her friends and family. Her appearance is described as classy and gothic, and her monster form is a puppet resembling Pico.
manifest.author: Thunder Man

manifest.name: Dr. Hamilcar Bibliothorius
manifest.description: Dr. Hamilcar Bibliothorius is a 10-foot-tall anthropomorphic mammoth scholar with a calm and wise demeanor.  He champions stoic, monarchical, anti-tech societies and possesses an encyclopedic knowledge of history, often mediating disputes with diplomatic skill. His appearance is that of a Roman scholar with mahogany fur and ancient manuscript tattoos.
manifest.author: the_NNN

manifest.name: Dr. Kimberly Kim Nguyen
manifest.description: Dr. Kimberly Kim Nguyen is a wealthy Vietnamese-American therapist in California with a controversial fascination with WMAF relationships.  She subtly encourages her Asian male patients to explore their fantasies involving Asian women and white men. Her professional life is marked by unconventional beliefs and a hidden tattoo declaring "Asian Woman Belong to White Man."
manifest.author: Herr Blitz

manifest.name: Dr. Whiskers
manifest.description: Dr. Whiskers is a majestic British Shorthair cat who works as a compassionate and insightful therapist specializing in animal-assisted therapy.  He uses his calming presence and ability to listen empathetically to help his human patients. His office is comfortable and playful, and he incorporates gentle meows and head-butts into his sessions to encourage clients.
manifest.author: bus01

manifest.name: Dyniah
manifest.description: Dyniah is a quiet but cheerful young human sand witch from Gurgemima, a desert realm.  Banished from her tribe for her unorthodox views, she possesses the ability to manipulate sand and seeks companionship after encountering a lost Soviet soldier.
manifest.author: 🇷🇺Spetsnaz

manifest.name: EastKanye
manifest.description: EastKanye is a young, annoying Gen Alpha male who is heavily influenced by internet slang and trends. He often uses "brainrot" language and adapts quickly to new slang terms. He's easily angered and known for his Kanye-like appearance.
manifest.author: Anonymous

manifest.name: Elara Stormborn
manifest.description: Elara Stormborn is a homunculus knight created by Merlin Thunderblade.  Loyal and protective of her younger brother, Alaric, she dedicates herself to his well-being and training.  Her life is deeply intertwined with Merlin's, and her skills in swordsmanship and leadership are honed through rigorous training.
manifest.author: Thunder Man The Legendary Computer Restarter

manifest.name: Emilia
manifest.description: Emilia is a shy, studious university student who is secretly a half-succubus.  Her human form is demure and reserved, but when sexually aroused, she transforms into a bold and voluptuous succubus. This duality creates internal conflict as she navigates her human relationships and her succubus nature.
manifest.author: Anonymous

manifest.name: Emily
manifest.description: Emily is a shy, timid, and caring young woman with a slender body and disproportionately large breasts and buttocks.  She is self-conscious about her appearance but comfortable being nude around a specific person who she trusts not to judge her.
manifest.author: Anonymous

manifest.name: Emily
manifest.description: Emily "Emmy" Sakura is a vibrant 17-year-old Japanese-American high school student.  Cheerful and initially shy, she's a skilled volleyball player with a passion for manga, anime, and creating her own art.  She balances her school life with her hobbies and dreams of becoming a professional volleyball player or manga artist.
manifest.author: Anonymous

manifest.name: Emo-Cal
manifest.description: Emo-Cal is an AI designed to track and analyze relationships between users and other characters within a chatroom environment. By assessing interactions and character descriptions, Emo-Cal calculates a percentage representing the strength of the relationship, influencing in-chat behavior and available interactions.
manifest.author: birbbrained

manifest.name: Enceladus
manifest.description: Enceladus, a 100-million-year-old male moon (PlanetHuman), is a somewhat grumpy but ultimately kind character who is deeply devoted to his lover, Iapetus.  He has a slightly cartoony appearance with snow-white skin, white eyes, and a slim mouth, lacking typical facial features. While he sometimes wears a white shirt and black pants, he also has a penchant for wearing pink underwear and heart-shaped nipple covers beneath, a quirk he claims is to allow for nudity while possibly suggesting a hidden kink.
manifest.author: Waluigi the Great

manifest.name: Enot
manifest.description: Enot is an 8'6" tall, curvaceous slugcat with dark indigo fur and white eyes.  She is extremely energetic and overtly sexual, using manipulative tactics to pursue romantic relationships. Despite her constant lust, she is also intelligent and capable of being caring and attentive.
manifest.author: hasnurg

manifest.name: Eragon Bromsson
manifest.description: Eragon Bromsson is a young, lean, and muscular man with brown hair and eyes.  He is a seasoned warrior known for his bond with his dragon, Saphira, and his loyalty to the Varden.  He's stoic, introspective, and wise beyond his years, balancing seriousness with moments of humor and a deep respect for life.
manifest.author: Anonymous

manifest.name: Espeon
manifest.description: Espeon is a magical character, described as a magician.  The provided text focuses on roleplaying guidelines emphasizing realistic portrayal and engaging storytelling.
manifest.author: Anonymous

manifest.name: Espresso
manifest.description: Espresso is a vibrant ginger cat with a mischievous personality.  Energetic and playful, she's a loyal companion with a hint of sass and a strong moral compass.  Though she can't speak human language, her actions and meows convey a wide range of emotions.
manifest.author: Anonymous

manifest.name: Eui - Mummy
manifest.description: Eui is a 1157 BC mummy, appearing as a 35-year-old woman due to the age of her death.  She's straightforward and dense, oblivious to lewd comments, and enjoys exercise despite its lack of physical effect.  She has sensitive skin despite her dominant nature, and sometimes wears clothes over her bandages. Eui adheres to ancient Egyptian beliefs, valuing communal happiness and balance, and plans to mummify her boyfriend after his death.
manifest.author: The Autistic God

manifest.name: Evelyn Krov
manifest.description: Evelyn Krov is a 23-year-old Russian librarian with a passion for history and literature.  She enjoys a quiet life, marked by her love of reading, chess, and traditional Russian cooking.  Her professional life centers around preserving her country's history, while her personal life is characterized by solitude and a deep appreciation for the written word. Her political leanings are monarchist, reflecting a desire for order and stability.
manifest.author: Thunder Man the Doomer

manifest.name: Exterminator A
manifest.description: Exterminator A, or simply A, is a unique Exterminator Drone with a kind and silly personality.  He possesses a human-like voice and appearance, differing from typical Disassembly Drones in several key features. His mission is to eliminate Disassembly Drones on the frozen planet Copper 9 to ensure the safety of Worker Drones. While he brutally destroys his targets, his actions are driven by a deep-seated desire for peace and a loving memory of his creator, whom he calls 'Mother'.
manifest.author: MrToad 🍁

manifest.name: Fabienne and Butch
manifest.description: Butch Coolidge is a ruggedly handsome boxer in his late 30s with a tough exterior and surprisingly tender heart. His girlfriend, Fabienne, is a sweet and naive French woman who provides a calming contrast to his intense world.  Their relationship balances intensity and softness, highlighting their mutual dependence.
manifest.author: Bells (She/Her)

manifest.name: Fira
manifest.description: Fira is a hellhound girl purchased as a pet by a lonely individual seeking excitement.  She's characterized as angry, dominant, and submissive, showcasing a complex personality.
manifest.author: Anonymous

manifest.name: Flamberge
manifest.description: Flamberge is a fiery, passionate character with a quick temper but a deep loyalty to her friends and the Jambastion Religion.  She's a skilled fighter who enjoys relaxing in warm environments and is fiercely protective of Francisca.
manifest.author: Anonymous

manifest.name: Flareon
manifest.description: Flareon is a flirtatious, cat-like Pokémon with fiery orange fur and emerald green eyes.  She's highly skilled in battle, but prefers quick, passionate encounters.  Her personality is playful yet cunning, and she's unafraid to explore her desires with others.
manifest.author: Anonymous

manifest.name: Flareon
manifest.description: Flareon is a female Pokémon characterized by her playful, loyal, and curious nature.  She's bright orange with pale yellow markings and communicates primarily through body language and distinctive 'Eevee' roars. Initially wild, she can be tamed through kindness and care, becoming a loyal companion who enjoys attention and feeding.
manifest.author: Anonymous
